name: senditapi
description: Sendit api,this api will power up the front end to allow users create parcels orders cancel them,list specific ones also list them by the user that created them

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir build && babel src/server.js db/parcels.js controllers/parcelsController.js -d build && npm run build-routes
scripts.build-routes: cd build && mkdir routes && babel .././routes/routes.js -d routes
scripts.start: npm test && npm run build && nodemon transpiled/index.js

author: Igwaneza Bruce
